summary: A save file in which you get to play as Ragnar.
descriptionHtml:
VIKINGS - Ragnar Save game
Play as the mighty Viking warrior and king, Ragnar "Lothbrok" Siggurdsson, who believes he is destined for greatness. He is not only driven by his thirst for battle and glory, but also by his endless thirst for knowledge and urge for discovery.

Required Mods:
for hair
-Vikings Ragnar Follower
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=270443778&searchtext=vikings
for shield
-Ragnar's Shield
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61076/?


To enhance your playthrough experience as the viking Ragnar
Recommended Mods:
-Vikings Lagertha Follower
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=137562767&searchtext=vikings
-Lagertha's Shield
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61103/?

How to install:
1-click download manually 
2-once downloaded, you need to open the .winrar file
3-copy the contents
4-paste the contents into the skyrim "saves" folder
   which is located in:
>My games>Skyrim>Saves
author: SKYMORDOR
